events.name: Ukraine's long-range rocket strike on Russian forces
events.wd_label: Ukraine's long-range rocket strike on Russian forces
events.wd_description: Ukraine confirmed a long-range rocket strike against Russian forces in southern Ukraine, with plans for a counter-offensive using hundreds of thousands of troops.
events.description: Ukraine confirmed a long-range rocket strike against Russian forces in southern Ukraine, with plans for a counter-offensive using hundreds of thousands of troops.

events.name: Ukrainian strike
events.wd_description: Ukraine carried out a long-range rocket strike against Russian forces and military equipment in southern Ukraine.
events.description: Ukraine carried out a long-range rocket strike against Russian forces and military equipment in southern Ukraine.

events.name: Russian-installed authorities' report
events.wd_description: Russian-installed authorities reported that the attack resulted in at least seven deaths and around 70 injuries, claiming civilians and civilian infrastructure were hit.
events.description: Russian-installed authorities reported that the attack resulted in at least seven deaths and around 70 injuries, claiming civilians and civilian infrastructure were hit.

events.name: Ukraine's military statement
events.wd_description: Ukraine's southern military command reported that the strike resulted in the loss of 52 Russian personnel, a Msta-B howitzer, a mortar, seven vehicles, and an ammunition depot in Nova Kakhovka.
events.description: Ukraine's southern military command reported that the strike resulted in the loss of 52 Russian personnel, a Msta-B howitzer, a mortar, seven vehicles, and an ammunition depot in Nova Kakhovka.

events.name: Nancy Pelosi's visit to Taiwan
events.wd_description: US House Speaker Nancy Pelosi visited Taiwan, marking the most senior US politician visit in 25 years, prompting strong reactions from China.
events.description: US House Speaker Nancy Pelosi visited Taiwan, marking the most senior US politician visit in 25 years, prompting strong reactions from China.

events.name: Pelosi's visit
events.wd_description: Nancy Pelosi, the most senior US politician to visit Taiwan in 25 years, met with leaders in Taipei's capital.
events.description: Nancy Pelosi, the most senior US politician to visit Taiwan in 25 years, met with leaders in Taipei's capital.

events.name: Chinese government's response
events.wd_description: The Chinese government accused the United States of violating China’s sovereignty under the guise of democracy, with Foreign Minister Wang Yi issuing a warning.
events.description: The Chinese government accused the United States of violating China’s sovereignty under the guise of democracy, with Foreign Minister Wang Yi issuing a warning.

events.name: Pelosi's statement
events.wd_description: Nancy Pelosi stated that China cannot prevent world leaders from traveling to Taiwan to respect its democracy, highlight its successes, and reaffirm commitment to collaboration.
events.description: Nancy Pelosi stated that China cannot prevent world leaders from traveling to Taiwan to respect its democracy, highlight its successes, and reaffirm commitment to collaboration.

events.name: Biden's disapproval
events.wd_description: President Joe Biden, Pelosi's party colleague, did not approve of her visit, stating that the American military felt it was "not a good idea right now" due to high tensions with China.
events.description: President Joe Biden, Pelosi's party colleague, did not approve of her visit, stating that the American military felt it was "not a good idea right now" due to high tensions with China.

events.name: Ukraine gains ground in Kharkiv counteroffensive
events.wd_label: Ukraine gains ground in Kharkiv counteroffensive
events.wd_description: Ukrainian military confirmed significant gains in a counteroffensive in the north-eastern Kharkiv region, with President Zelenskiy announcing the reclamation of a vital city and repelling Russian offensives.
events.description: Ukrainian military confirmed significant gains in a counteroffensive in the north-eastern Kharkiv region, with President Zelenskiy announcing the reclamation of a vital city and repelling Russian offensives.

events.name: Zelenskiy's announcement
events.wd_description: President Volodymyr Zelenskiy announced that Ukrainian forces have reclaimed a vital city in the Kharkiv region and are repelling Russian offensives across the country.
events.description: President Volodymyr Zelenskiy announced that Ukrainian forces have reclaimed a vital city in the Kharkiv region and are repelling Russian offensives across the country.

events.name: video of Ukrainian soldiers
events.wd_description: Zelenskiy posted a video of Ukrainian soldiers standing above a building in Balakliia, held by the Russians for six months, with the Ukrainian flag.
events.description: Zelenskiy posted a video of Ukrainian soldiers standing above a building in Balakliia, held by the Russians for six months, with the Ukrainian flag.

events.name: reclamation of Balakliia
events.wd_description: Ukrainian forces reclaimed the key city of Balakliia in the Kharkiv region, which had been held by Russian forces for six months.
events.description: Ukrainian forces reclaimed the key city of Balakliia in the Kharkiv region, which had been held by Russian forces for six months.

events.name: Ukrainian troops reaching Kupyansk
events.wd_description: Ukrainian troops reached the city of Kupyansk, a key logistics and supply hub for Russian forces, though the city is yet to be fully retaken by Ukrainian forces.
events.description: Ukrainian troops reached the city of Kupyansk, a key logistics and supply hub for Russian forces, though the city is yet to be fully retaken by Ukrainian forces.

events.name: EV battery supply chain challenges and strategies
events.wd_label: EV battery supply chain challenges and strategies
events.wd_description: The complexities and strategies involved in developing a sustainable EV battery supply chain in the United States, addressing the need for domestic production and alternative sources.
events.description: The complexities and strategies involved in developing a sustainable EV battery supply chain in the United States, addressing the need for domestic production and alternative sources.

events.name: graphite production
events.wd_description: Graphite is a critical material for EV batteries, with the U.S. currently relying on China for production despite having domestic resources.
events.description: Graphite is a critical material for EV batteries, with the U.S. currently relying on China for production despite having domestic resources.

events.name: t: challenges in U.S. production
events.wd_description: The U.S. lacks investment in EV-quality graphite production, making it reliant on Chinese imports despite having domestic resources.
events.description: The U.S. lacks investment in EV-quality graphite production, making it reliant on Chinese imports despite having domestic resources.

events.name: t: synthetic graphite
events.wd_description: Synthetic graphite, made from waste petroleum products, is considered the best approach for long-lasting EV batteries.
events.description: Synthetic graphite, made from waste petroleum products, is considered the best approach for long-lasting EV batteries.

events.name: t: environmental considerations
events.wd_description: Graphite refining involves environmental costs, with newer methods being developed to meet local regulations and reduce impact.
events.description: Graphite refining involves environmental costs, with newer methods being developed to meet local regulations and reduce impact.

events.name: new legislation
events.wd_description: The Inflation Reduction Act and other legislative measures aim to incentivize domestic EV battery production and reduce reliance on Chinese imports.
events.description: The Inflation Reduction Act and other legislative measures aim to incentivize domestic EV battery production and reduce reliance on Chinese imports.

events.name: t: tax credits
events.wd_description: The new bill includes subsidies and tax credits for U.S. drivers to buy EVs, with conditions on manufacturing and raw material sourcing.
events.description: The new bill includes subsidies and tax credits for U.S. drivers to buy EVs, with conditions on manufacturing and raw material sourcing.

events.name: t: IRS determination
events.wd_description: The IRS will determine which vehicles and their supply chains qualify for the new tax credits.
events.description: The IRS will determine which vehicles and their supply chains qualify for the new tax credits.

events.name: t: Defense Production Act
events.wd_description: The Biden administration invoked the Defense Production Act to invest in critical material production and stimulate domestic industries.
events.description: The Biden administration invoked the Defense Production Act to invest in critical material production and stimulate domestic industries.

events.name: securing alternative suppliers
events.wd_description: Efforts to secure alternative suppliers for raw materials and battery components to reduce dependency on Chinese imports.
events.description: Efforts to secure alternative suppliers for raw materials and battery components to reduce dependency on Chinese imports.

events.name: t: friend-shoring agenda
events.wd_description: The U.S. aims to trade with trusted partners, excluding China, to secure supplies for the EV battery supply chain.
events.description: The U.S. aims to trade with trusted partners, excluding China, to secure supplies for the EV battery supply chain.

events.name: t: partnerships with international suppliers
events.wd_description: Partnerships with countries like Australia, Canada, and Korea to secure materials such as lithium, cobalt, and graphite.
events.description: Partnerships with countries like Australia, Canada, and Korea to secure materials such as lithium, cobalt, and graphite.

events.name: innovation and investment
events.wd_description: Investment in new technologies and production facilities to build a domestic EV battery industry and reduce reliance on imports.
events.description: Investment in new technologies and production facilities to build a domestic EV battery industry and reduce reliance on imports.

events.name: t: technological breakthroughs
events.wd_description: Innovations in battery technology, such as new lithium extraction methods and alternative battery chemistries, to improve supply chain sustainability.
events.description: Innovations in battery technology, such as new lithium extraction methods and alternative battery chemistries, to improve supply chain sustainability.

events.name: t: domestic production facilities
events.wd_description: Building new facilities in the U.S. to produce battery cells and packs, aiming to qualify for tax credits and reduce import reliance.
events.description: Building new facilities in the U.S. to produce battery cells and packs, aiming to qualify for tax credits and reduce import reliance.

events.name: t: securing investments
events.wd_description: Attracting investments to expand production capabilities and develop a robust domestic supply chain for EV batteries.
events.description: Attracting investments to expand production capabilities and develop a robust domestic supply chain for EV batteries.
